topic.title: ZeroNet Mobile with modern ui released to Google Play Store.
topic.body:
ZeroNet Mobile with modern ui released to Google Play Store.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.canews.zeronet

Github releases at https://github.com/canewsin/zeronet_mobile/releases

topic.title: ZeroNet Mobile with modern ui released to Google Play Store.
topic.body:
ZeroNet Mobile with modern ui released to Google Play Store.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.canews.zeronetmobile

ApkPure : 
https://apkpure.com/p/in.canews.zeronetmobile

Github releases at 
https://github.com/canewsin/zeronet_mobile/releases

For Reporting Issues about the App Link for Support forum
[ZeroNet Mobile](/15UYrA7aXr2Nto1Gg4yWXpY3EAJwafMTNk) 

ZeroNet is a p2p network that BitTorrent network and uses bitcoin cryptography.
It has built in tor support for privacy and anonymity.
More about ZeroNet at https://zeronet.io
Try and give your feedback. ðŸ˜ƒðŸ˜˜
